did.unittitle: Records Relating to Lawrence Park Heat, Light and Power Company, 1974-1979
did.abstract: Legal briefs, minutes of a hearing, transcripts of testimony and of a hearing, correspondence and memorandums, briefing papers, and other documents relating to rate increase requests and a request to abandon a steam distribution line presented to the State of New York Public Service Commission by Lawrence Park Heat, Light and Power Company.

scopecontent.p: The records relating to the Lawrence Park Heat, Light and Power Company concern four requests to raise rates and to abandon a steam distribution line made by the company before the State of New York Public Service Commission during the period 1974-1979. The collection consists of legal briefs, minutes of a hearing, transcripts of testimony and of a hearing, correspondence and memorandums, briefing papers, and other documents. The commission requested that the records be deposited at the Bronxville Public Library for study by interested citizens who might be affected by commission decisions. Following the hearings, the library gave the records to the Bronxville History Center.

userestrict.p: Records are available at the Bronxville History Center (Bronxville Public Library) by appointment. Contact the Village Historian at geselbracht321@gmail.com.
